about_the_game:
Your parents are off for an extended trip, leaving you in charge of the manor and all the staff, but they know their skirt-chasing son isn’t to be trusted! They’ve made sure no unexpected heirs will be popping up in nine months by hiring the perfect maids for the job, ones that can’t be impregnated- no matter how hard you try!

They’re diligent, hardworking and incredible at sucking dick. Our protagonist had no idea his first time was going to be with a boy~ Now, who to choose first?


Rin’s a naughty little maid, always looking to tempt his Master into paying him some real close attention. With that cute little fanged smile, and extremely skilled tongue, who could possibly resist this feisty little troublemaker?! He’s the type to “accidentally” fall down and land on his master’s cock- ass first!


Hinata’s a hard worker who takes his job seriously, but is always down to serve his master’s every need. With that soft hair, gentle smile, and tight little ass, you’ll forget all life’s troubles as you pound away at his bussy. Distract him too much, and you might end up making a big mess, not that he’s complaining ♥


Fumio is serious, dedicated, and not-so-secretly in love with his Master! There’s no way you’ll accidentally make any offspring with this femboy maid, so feel free to pump him full of baby batter! With a little nudging, break through his shy exterior and he’ll admit his filthy desires for dick!

Always remember, femboys FOREVER!

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • All the maids are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • Yaoi, BL, Femboys, whatever you want to call it, this is the Miel game that finally has IT!

Otoko Orgy at Maid Boy Manor Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: Maid boys are softer than any sponge
Oh Nyo Master~ I'm all tied up and helpwess!
Battle for the title of "Best Boy"
We love our gifts from Master!

content_descriptors.notes: - Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Your parents are away and it’s time to play! You can finally get your grubby little hands on the sweet and soft maids that work in your mansion, only to find out that these pretty maids are actually… boys?! Well… It’d be a shame NOT to try out their tight little bussies, right?!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
